name: ERC721TokenProxy
description: ERC721TokenProxy. Helps to reduces the size of the deployed bytecode for automatically created tokens, by using a proxy contract.

functionDecorators.name: implementation
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves the implementation contract address, mirrored token image.

functionDecorators.name: setImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Updates the implementation contract address. Only the bridge and bridge owner can call this method.
